entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 03:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
